title: Willing Hands Exercises
introText: Willing Hands skills help you ground your attention in the present moment. Use these exercises to quiet mental chatter and develop mindful awareness through your body, senses, and thoughts.

exercises.title: Willing Hands Practice
exercises.description: Learn and practice the willing hands posture to cultivate acceptance and reduce resistance.

exercises.title: Saved Entries
exercises.description: Review your previous willing hands practice sessions and track your progress.
